lines.text: So how you like chasin' bad guys?
Aw, we don't have many bad guys out here in the sticks, Lieutenant.
There are bad guys everywhere.
We spent a lot of shit on this, Morgan, waiting for the right - the right conditions. We duplicated fucking Moscow here. We're this close, do you understand? Nothing is gonna get in our way. Nothing.

[breaking away from kissing]
Hey, hey. How old are you?
Nineteen.
No - Really?
Chicken.
Fred, I showed you Ben Morgan's body. The man virtually *exploded*.
What do you expect out of somebody who was thrown out of a damned pickup truck?
You know in almost every case, bright lights in the sky, no tracks, strange noises...
UFOs, huh?
Look pal, if it's UFOs, it's bigger than all of us. That's like saying God did it. But if it's not UFOs...
Those two couldn't mutilate a hot dog without leaving tracks. This devil cult stuff is just to throw you off. You better keep looking, Sheriff.
What are you doin'?
Nothin'.
What are you grinnin' at?
Nothin'!
You're sixteen, that guy's thirty years old!
So what? My mother was sixteen when she married you, right?
So what?
Yeah? So I like older men. They remind me of the father I never had.
Oh, yeah, yeah? Well, you got one now, kid.
The test results from the catalog that you sent to me were interesting.
Really! What'd you find?
Clostridium botulinum.
What?
Botulinum. It's a poison, extremely deadly. And uh, this particular strain has been modified by gene splicing.
Where does it come from?
Well, I'd never sign my name to this. Uh, Lieutenant Castle did say he wouldn't quote me?
No, I won't.

Yes, well, uh, the only place I've ever heard of it showing up was in some germ warfare tests that the government was doing, back before this was all banned, back in 1969 and 1970. So, what have you got going on out there?

If what's goin' on around here is organized, you don't want to go up against it. The government, the right wing, the left wing, mercenaries, the mob... It doesn't make much difference if you get in their way.
Look, I burned out, okay? I'd spend six months putting a guy inside and then in a day his lawyer would have him back out on the street.
